projectItems.name: COVID-CARE
projectItems.desc: COVID-CARE is a website designed for tracking the COVID-19 pandemic data like deaths, cases & recoveries, upcoming vaccine informtion & top headlines related to COVID-19.

projectItems.name: HomeMade
projectItems.desc: HomeMade is an e-commerce website designed for selling all kinds of homemade products from delicious foods to aesthetic artworks.

projectItems.name: HEADLINER
projectItems.desc: HEADLINER is a news website displaying the top 10 breaking news headlines all over the world. You can check out the top 10 headlines for any specific topic you want as well.

projectItems.name: The Next Read
projectItems.desc: The Next Read is a platform for bibliophiles to share their books among each other by buying, selling, lending or borrowing used books.
